prompts: Create a powerful bipedal Pokemon with spikes and a vibrant purple body.
I want a tough-looking Pokemon that has a mix of purple and green colors.
Generate a Pokemon that stands tall with a muscular build and sharp claws.
Make a fierce creature resembling a dinosaur with unique horn features.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in rocky terrains and showcases strong physical attributes.
Design a Pokemon with a commanding presence and a bold color palette.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies strength and has a rugged, textured appearance.
